title: Looking for mid-grade HOFers--Have similar plus cash
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: Looking for mid-grade HOFers--Have similar plus cash
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to add a PSA 5 or 6  Hall of Famer.  I have a few nice HOF mid-grade that I might be willing to trade, adding cash if need be, or doing a 3 for 2 or some such.   I should note that I am a nut on centering so any cards in return would have to have great centering....Maybe this will go nowhere, but here are a few I might trade, I will send scans if you email (epic1934@aol.com).  Needless to say, all have great centering...

Waddell portrait    PSA 3.5
Bender portrait  SGC 55
Willis portrait (Pirates)  SGC 50
E. Collins  SGC 40    EPDG
Kelley  SGC 50    EPDG
